title: Skill titles
data:
{{version032}}
Your character will be given a '''skill title''' based on their current skill set. To determine the title, a character's skills are placed into five tiers: Lvl 1-7, 8-14, 15-20, 21-26, and 27. Your character's title is determined by their highest skill -- any time a different skill surpasses your current highest skill, your title will change to reflect it. Your title will also change when your current highest skill reaches a new tier. The first skill to reach level 27 will determine your character's final title.

''* Title determined by whether your STR or DEX is higher.''

''** Title determined by (upper) body size: Weightless (Djinn), Fly (Spriggans), Feather (Kobolds and Tengu), Light (Deep Elves), Middle (Humans and everyone else not included in other categories), Cruiser (species with torso smaller than lower body, ie. Nagas and Armataurs), and Heavy (Oni and Trolls).''

''*** Title determined by method of locomotion. [[Octopode]]: Plane Wriggler; [[Tengu]]: Plane Glider; [[Naga]]: Plane Slitherer; [[Vine Stalker]]: Plane Stalker, [[Armataur]]: Plane Roller.''

''**** The invocations titles above will be used if the character is currently following no [[god]]. A skilled Invocations-user will otherwise use the title assigned by their god and [[piety]] level, such as "Missionary" for 3-star [[Beogh]]. A table for this can be found below.''

''***** Title determined by whether or not you worship an evil god.''

''****** [[Demigod]]s get the title "God of Death".''

==Invocations Titles==
Titles for the [[invocations]] skill depend on piety level and god being worshipped. Gods which don't require training invocations still have titles based on them, although will mostly only be encountered when playing as a [[Gnoll]].

''*** Title determined by method of locomotion.''

''**** Many species use a word other than child, [[Felid]]="Kitten", [[Tengu]]="Chick", [[Gnoll]] or [[Armataur]]="Pup", [[Formicid]]="Larva", [[Minotaur]]="Calf", [[Barachi]]="Tadpole", [[Octopode]]="Fry".''


Since Gozag has no piety system, its Invocations titles work off current amount of gold:
{| class="prettytable" cellpadding="6" border="1"

! '''100-499 gold'''
! '''500-999 gold'''
! '''1000-4999 gold'''
! '''5000-9999 gold'''
! '''10000-49999 gold'''
! '''50000+ gold'''
|-
| '''[[Gozag]]'''
| Profligate*
| Pauper
| Entrepreneur
| Capitalist
| Rich
| Opulent
| Tycoon
| Plutocrat
|}

Since [[Xom]] follows no piety system and is utterly unpredictable, its followers are given the same title regardless of interest:
{| class="prettytable" cellpadding="6" border="1"
|- align="center"
! '''God'''
! '''Any amount of [[Invocations]]'''
|- align="center"
| '''[[Xom]]'''
| Toy
|}

==Custom Titles==
Certain species/skill combinations result in custom titles:
*[[Armataur]] + 27 Polearms = "Prickly [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pangolin Pangolin]"
*[[Armataur]] + 27 Invocations + [[Good god]] = "Holy Roller"
*[[Armataur]] + 27 Invocations + [[Qazlal]] = "Rolling Thunder"
*[[Barachi]] + Any level of Invocations + No God = "God-Hated"
*[[Coglin]] + 27 Invocations + [[Fedhas]] = "Cobgoblin"
*[[Coglin]] + 27 Armour = "Iron Golem"
*[[Coglin]] + 27 Spellcasting = "Cogmind"
*[[Deep Elf]] + 27 Short Blades = "[[deep elf blademaster|Blademaster]]"
*[[Deep Elf]] + 27 Ranged Weapons = "[[deep elf master archer|Master Archer]]"
*[[Demonspawn]] + 27 Invocations + [[Evil]] god = "[[demonspawn blood saint|Blood Saint]]"
*[[Djinni]] + 27 Spellcasting = "Wishgranter"
*[[Djinni]] + 27 Fire Magic = "Smokeless Flame"
*[[Djinni]] + 27 Ice Magic = "[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marid Marid]"
*[[Draconian]] + 27 Hexes = "[[Faerie Dragon Scales|Faerie Dragon]]"
*[[Draconian]] + 27 Air Magic = "[[storm dragon|Storm Dragon]]"
*[[Draconian]] + 27 Earth Magic = "[[iron dragon|Iron Dragon]]"
*[[Draconian]] + 27 Fire Magic = "[[fire dragon|Fire Dragon]]"
*[[Draconian]] + 27 Ice Magic = "[[ice dragon|Ice Dragon]]"
*[[Draconian]] + 27 Alchemy = "[[swamp dragon|Swamp Dragon]]"
*[[Draconian]] + 27 Invocations + Good god = "[[pearl dragon|Pearl Dragon]]"
*[[Felid]] + Unarmed Combat =  "Scratcher", "Gouger", "Ripper", "Eviscerator", "[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smilodon Sabretooth]"
*[[Formicid]] + 27 Translocations = "Teletunneler"
*[[Gargoyle]] + 27 Invocations + [[Jiyva]] = "[[Rockslime]]"
*[[Gargoyle]] + 27 Fire Magic = "Molten"
*[[Ghoul]] + 27 Fire Magic = "[[searing wretch|Searing Wretch]]"
*[[Human]] + 27 Fighting + [[Makhleb]] = "[[hell knight|Hell Knight]]"
*[[Merfolk]] + 27 Long Blades = "[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swordfish Swordfish]"
*[[Mummy]] + 27 Unarmed Combat = "Pharaoh"
*[[Mummy]] + 27 Fire Magic = "Highly Combustible"
*[[Mummy]] + 27 Invocations + [[Nemelex Xobeh]] = "[https://yugipedia.com/wiki/Exodia_the_Forbidden_One Forbidden One]"
*[[Mummy]] + 27 Invocations + [[Uskayaw]] = "[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crypt_of_the_NecroDancer Necrodancer]"
*[[Mummy]] + 27 Invocations + [[Gozag]] = "[[royal mummy|Royal Mummy]]"
*[[Octopode]] + 27 Unarmed Combat = "Crusher"
*[[Spriggan]] + 27 Necromancy = "[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/La_petite_mort Petite Mort]"
*[[Spriggan]] + 21 or more Shields = "[[spriggan defender|Defender]]"
*[[Troll]] + 21 or more Conjurations = "Wallbreaker"
*[[Troll]] + 27 Armour = "[[iron troll|Iron Troll]]"
*[[Vine Stalker]] + 27 Necromancy = "[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carrion_flower Corpseflower]"
*[[Vine Stalker]] + 27 Invocations + [[Nemelex Xobeh]] = "[https://gatherer.wizards.com/pages/card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=600 Black Lotus]"
*[[Vine Stalker]] + 27 Invocations + [[Dithmenos]] = "Nightshade"

==History==
*Prior to [[0.32]], certain gods had different Invocations titles:
**[[Yredelemnul]] did not use a standard piety system, so its titles were based on Invocations skill. These titles were Traitor (penance), Tainted (0-7), Torchbearer (8-11), Fey <foo> (12-15), Black Crusader (16-19), Sculptor of Flesh (20-23), Harbinger of Death (24-26), Grim Reaper (27).
**[[Beogh]]'s titles were Apostate, Messenger, Proselytiser, Priest, Missionary, Evangelist, Apostle, and Messiah.
**[[Dithmenos]]' titles were Ember, Gloomy, Darkened, Extinguished, Caliginous, Umbral, Hand of Shadow, and Eternal Night.
**[[Kikubaaqudgha]]'s titles were Tormented, Purveyor of Pain, Scholar of Death, Merchant of Misery, Artisan of Death, Dealer of Despair, Black Sun, and Lord of Darkness.
*Prior to [[0.31]], 27 Evocations gave the "Talismancer" title.
:Also, you could get the following custom titles while playing as a [[Meteoran]]:
::27 Maces & Flails = "[[Morningstar|Morning]]/[[Eveningstar|Evening]] Star" (based on time of day)
::27 Ranged Weapons = "Shooting Star"
::27 Air Magic = "Meteorite"
::27 Earth Magic = "Rock Star"
::27 Translocations = "Black Hole"
::27 Invocations + [[Dithmenos]] = "[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Starry_Night Starry Night]"
::27 Invocations + [[Zin]] = "[[silver star|Silver Star]]"
::27 Invocations + [[Lugonu]] = "[[wretched star|Wretched Star]]" (briefly present in [[trunk]])
:And one title from an [[Ogre]]:
::Any level of spellcasting = [[Ogre mage]]
:Additionally, a few species-specific "Fooish Child" titles were added in 0.31.
*Prior to [[0.27]], [[Naga]]s had different Walking titles as they slid instead of slither.
